sentences.sContent: Cast forth lightning and scatter them send out thine arrows and discomfit them.
sentences.sContent_eng: Cast forth lightning and scatter them send out thine arrows and discomfit them.
sentences.sCn: 求你发出闪电使他们四散射出你的箭使他们扰乱。

synos.tran: 挫败；扰乱，破坏；使…为难；使…破灭

remMethod.val: dis (不) + com (来) + fit (合适) → 来了却不合适， 还不如不来 → 扰乱
